contentList.content:
Blast a cone of bubbles, dealing [1] and Wetting all characters.

Also douses flames and sets Dampened, reducing damage dealt by [2]%.

Blast a cone of bubbles, dealing [1] and Wetting all characters.

Also douses flames and sets Dampened, reducing damage dealt by [2]%.

Blast a cone of bubbles, dealing [1] and Wetting all characters.

Also douses flames and sets Dampened, reducing damage dealt by [2]%.

Nefarious winds freeze the battlefield in a cone, dealing [1] to all characters, instantly killing Frozen characters with less than 15% Vitality.

Survivors of the blast become Frozen.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Blast steam in a cone, hitting allies and enemies:

Ally: Restores Vitality for each of 3 turns.

Enemy: Deals [1] upfront and applies Scalded, reducing Water Resistance by [3]% and Fire Resistance by [4]%, as well as dealing [2] for each of 2 turns.

This skill also hits the caster and leaves behind a steam cloud for 2 turns.
Every snowflake is unique; mortals are no different.
The path of Hydromancy is a cold one. Should you require any more spells, do ask.

Blow a giant bubble at target location, lasting 2 turns.

Whilst in the bubble, allies become Wet and gain Deflecting, providing [1] and deflecting all projectiles back to their origin.

Whilst in the bubble, enemies become Dampened, reducing damage dealt by [2]%.

Conjure a whirlpool at target location for 3 turns.

Whilst in the whirlpool, allies become Wet and gain 30% Movement Speed and 15% Dodging.

Whilst in the bubble, enemies become Wet and have -30% Movement Speed and -15% Dodging.
A shroud of ice freezes them in places and renders them invulnerable to damage.

Deals [1] damage per turn.
Removed by Warm, Burning, or Necrofire.
Ice forms a protective barrier around you.

Allows you to apply <font color="#cfecff">Hypothermia</font> regardless of whether your targets are <font color="#cfecff">Chilled</font>, <font color="#cfecff">Frozen</font>, or have <font color="#188ede">Magic Armour</font>.

Command a stream of water to bounce between up to 6 allies or enemies:

Ally: Restores [1].

Enemy: Deals [2].

Leaves a water surface and sets Wet upon hitting a character.

Shoot an icy projectiles at each of 3 targets, dealing [1].

Each icicle Chills targets and creates a small ice surface upon impact.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.
Throw your shield, dealing [2] + [1] (based on current <font color='#188ede'>Magic Armour</font>) to the target. The shield bounces to an additional target.

Spray a beam of bubbles, dealing a total of [2].

Creates a Water surface upon impact.

Spray a beam of 12 bubbles, each dealing [1] and setting Wet.

Creates a Water surface upon impact.

Shoot a shard of ice, piercing through characters for [1].

The shard Chills enemies and creates a small ice surface.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [3] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [4]%.

Range: [2]
Chilled makes target less resistant to water spells, but a bit more resistant to fire spells. Chilled has a negative impact on movement. Chilled targets that get chilled again, turn frozen.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

Shoot a shard of ice, piercing through characters for [1].

The shard Chills enemies and creates a small ice surface.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [3] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [4]%.

Range: [2]
Chilled makes target less resistant to water spells, but a bit more resistant to fire spells. Chilled has a negative impact on movement. Chilled targets that get chilled again, turn frozen.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

Ride atop your trident, dealing [1] and Wetting characters upon arrival.

Upon landing, all characters are slightly pushed away from you.

Range: [2]
Chilled makes target less resistant to water spells, but a bit more resistant to fire spells. Chilled has a negative impact on movement. Chilled targets that get chilled again, turn frozen.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

A barrage of [3] ice shards rain from the sky, each dealing [1] to enemies within [4] range from impact.

The shards Chill and create an ice surface upon impact.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Range: [4]
Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

Ice pellets fall from the sky, each dealing [1]. The pellets also Chill and create an ice surface upon impact.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Hail crashes onto the battlefield, each dealing [1] and Chilling all characters. The hail forms a perfectly-circular frozen surface upon impact.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Ice pellets fall from the sky, each Chilling and dealing [1] damage.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Creates an ice surface upon impact.

Muster a downpour at the target area, creating water surfaces which spread and douse flames.

Sets Wet on all characters.

Radius: [1]
Duration: [2]
Creates water puddles on terrain, douses fires, and makes characters wet. Wet makes target less resistant to air spells but more resistant to fire spells.

Consume water and frozen surfaces around you, restoring Vitality and Magic Armour based on the surface area consumed this way.

Grants the caster Magic Shell, granting [1] for 1 turn.

Cleanses Burning, Necrofire, and Bleed Fire on-cast.

Bestow a mystical enchantment to all allies within 7m, granting Magic Armour Regeneration and [1] for 3 turns.

The enchantment also provides Slipping Immunity for its duration.

Northern winds Freeze susceptible surfaces around you, dealing [1] and Chilling enemies.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Draw upon the lifeblood of the planet to gain an enchantment that provides [1]% max. Vitality and [2]% max. Magic Armour.

Additionally, you and allies within [4]m are healed for [3] for each of 3 turns.

Set off a chain reaction which causes <font color="#cfecff">ice surfaces</font> to explode into <font color="#4197e2">water</font>, dealing <font color="#4197e2">significant water damage</font> and applying <font color="#cfecff">Chilled</font> to all characters.

Command spheres of restorative waters to heal each of your allies and Undead enemies for [1], and create a small water surface beneath them.

Cleanses Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned, and Bleeding.

Each ally consumes water and frozen surfaces around them, restoring Vitality and Magic Armour based on the surface area consumed this way.

Grants each ally Magic Shell, granting [1] for 1 turn.

Cleanses Burning, Necrofire, and Bleed Fire on-cast.

Deal [4] + [1] (based on current Magic Armour) and Chilling nearby enemies.

Creates an ice surface beneath hit enemies.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Channel the power of the tide, adding [1] to your weapon attacks and skills.

Basic attacks will Wet characters for 1 turn if they are not already Wet.

Gain Ice Barrier, providing [1] and an additional [1] for each nearby enemy who is either Chilled, Frozen, or affected by Hypothermia.

Whilst guarded by Ice Barrier, you gain [2]% Water Resistance and any attacking characters become Chilled.

Pull enemies towards you with a strong current, dealing [1].

Enemies are then pushed back a short distance and become Wet.

Gain Icy Veins, allowing you to apply Hypothermia regardless of whether your targets are Chilled, Frozen, or have Magic Armour.

Icy Veins reduces your Physical Resistance by [1]% and Movement Speed by [2]%.

Push enemies away from you with a forceful torrent, dealing [1] and applying Lost Footing.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

The oceans rhythm courses through you, granting Low Tide for 1 turn, granting [1] Hydrosophist and [2]% Water Resistance.

Upon expiry, Low Tide transforms into High Tide for 1 turn, granting [3] Hydrosophist and [4]% Water Resistance.

Upon expiry, High Tide transforms back into Low Tide for 1 turn. This instance does not transform upon expiry.

Deal [1] to enemies around you and applying Drowning, dealing [2] for each of 2 turns.

Non-Undead allies start regenerating [3] for 2 turns.

All characters become Wet.

Water spouts from below, dealing [1] and applying Lost Footing to all nearby characters.

Creates a water surface and sets Wet on characters around you.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Initiate a terrible thirst on all nearby allies, setting Vampiric Hunger for 2 turns, adding 50% Life Steal for its duration.

Life Steal heals the user based on any non-Piercing damage they deal to Vitality.

Fabricate an Ice Elemental at target location. The Elemental lasts 5 turns and is a bulky support.

At 10 Summoning, the Elemental increases in size and gains additional stats.

Restore 50% of the target's max. Magic Armour (plus bonuses).

Cleanses Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, and Madness from the target.

Instantly restores [1] to the target, and create a small water surface beneath them.

Cleanses Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned, and Bleeding.

This skill may be used on Undead enemies.

Place target ally or an enemy without any Magic Armour into an icy stasis, cleansing ailments and preventing all damage dealt for 1 turn:

Ally: Restores [1] upon thawing.

Enemy: Deals [2] upon thawing. Applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [3] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [4]%.

Chills characters upon thawing.

Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing [1].

Cleanses Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating, and Petrified from the target.

Target and Chill a nearby character, dealing [1].

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Enchant your target with a mystical barrier for 2 turns, providing [1] and [4]% max. Magic Armour. Frozen Bulwark also provides [2]% Water Resistance at the cost of [3]% Fire Resistance.

Removes Burning, Necrofire, Bleed Fire, and Frozen upon cast.

Whilst enchanted, the target is immune from Freezing and Slipping.

Deep from the depths, the Kraken emerges at target location, dealing [1] and applying Drowning for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn.

Enemies without Magic Armour are also Knocked-Down for 1 turn.

Target and Chill a nearby character, dealing [1].

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.

Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing [1].

Cleanses Burning, Stunned, Petrified, Diseased, Cursed, and Decaying from the target.
Strike the target 5 times with your trident, each hit dealing [1].

Restore [1] to the target on-cast and at the start of the next 2 turns. Cleanses Poisoned, Burning, and Bleeding.

Additionally, the target is also healed for 10% max Vitality on-cast.

Initiate a terrible thirst in a target ally, setting Vampiric Hunger for 2 turns, adding 50% Life Steal for its duration.

Life Steal heals the user based on any non-Piercing damage they deal to Vitality.

Deal [1] and Chill characters in the target area.

This skill freezes any blood and water surfaces in the area.

Hitting a Chilled or Frozen enemy with this skill applies Hypothermia for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn and reducing Water Resistance by [3]%.
Removes surfaces from the battlefield, reveals invisible characters and clears Warm, Burning and Hastened.
Draw an impassable wall of <font color="#cfecff">ice</font>, spanning up to [1] and lasting 2 turns. This wall creates a <font color="#cfecff">frozen surface</font>.

A wall of roaring water moves across the battlefield, dealing [1] and leaving a water surface in its wake.

Hitting an enemy with this skill applies Drowning for 2 turns, dealing [2] each turn.
